data.title: Multi-Camera Support
data.label: Allows for the thorough coverage of wide areas with several cameras.

data.title: AI and Machine Learning
data.label: Utilizes AI algorithms to identify unusual patterns and potential theft behaviors.

data.title: Instant Notifications
data.label: Real-time alerts notify security or managers of suspicious activity.

data.title: Software Updates
data.label: Regular updates to keep the system up-to-date with the latest security features and algorithms.

data.title: Blacklist Alerts
data.label: Automatically flags and alerts staff of returning individuals suspected of theft.

data.title: Follow Up
data.label: Continuously monitor and track shoplifting activities for improved security and loss prevention.
